transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (as Shaggy) This is a groovy dance floor, isn't it Velma?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (as Velma) Yeah. Why don't you try dancing on it instead of my feet?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (as Scooby Doo) (taps Shaggy's shoulder) Ray I rut in? (dances with Shaggy)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (as Velma) Well! I've seen a wallflower before, but this is ridiculous!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Greetings, citizens! I'm Space Ghost. What do you get when you cross a zombie with a raven? A very dead bird.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (in the wings) Yes sir! Dead as a doornail! That is what ya get, yeah!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Who's the geezer?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Also visiting tonight is my granddad, all the way from Boca Raton.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: The Sunshine State, ooooh yeah!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Sounds like Randy Savage.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, it's not, Zorak, it's my granddad, okay? So you can just shut up about that, Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Ooooh yeah, you tell him, Taddy!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Well, it looks like you with a pasted-on beard.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's not, Zorak, okay? Those are real hairs, I can see 'em from here.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Who's that little runt over there, is that Blip?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, Grandpa, that's Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: How ya doin', Blip? I need to start you out with some chin-ups.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Stay away from me, old fool.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Who's that red-headed fellow over there?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's Moltar, my director.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, from "The Ovens of Moltor." I met your father once in a steel cage match. I wish you could've seen your old man! Weepin' like a woman after my patented piledriver! Yeah, your dad remembers me. Ooooh yeah! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: But he whupped up on you pretty good in the Texas death match. (Monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Huh! 'Cause he snuck up behind me with a foreign object. He shoulda been disqualified!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hey, if the ref didn't see it, it didn't happen! (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, break it up, you two. It's time for my first guest.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Oh, yeah, talk show, go for it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to desk) (clears throat) My first guest tonight...

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: I'll be over here if you need me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) ... is Rob Zombie, of the band White...

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Won't say a word!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) ... White Zombie. (monitor lowers with Rob) Welcome, Mr. Zombie!

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, Mr. Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, I hear you're a zombie. That must really be something.

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: It's not, there's not a whole lot to being an undead guy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I hear you zombies like to eat people.

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: Wake up in the morning, have my Cheerios, you know, go back to bed. You don't get to do much.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Except eat people!

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: It's not true.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, it's true alright, my grandpa just said so.

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: Look, if I said it wasn't true the first time, it's not true the second time, buddy.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Hey there, cannibal, that's my grandson you're talkin' to!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) You tell him, Pappy!

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Shut it, Blip!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's Zorak, you crusty...

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: Gozar of the tiny hut-people, now is the time for your weekly beating.

transcript.speaker: Gozar
transcript.dialogue: (comes out of a tiny metallic hut) Is that you, saucer crab?

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: (ray gun pops up, blasts Gozar and hut to smithereens) Ha-ha-Ha! Ha-ha-Ha! Ha-ha-Ha! See you next Thursday! (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: You followin' me, space boy?

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Who you callin' 'boy'?

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, that's right, muscle boy.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Show him your awesome deltoids, Tadville!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Like this, Grandpa? (stands up and stretches muscles several times)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Flex it out more, space man!

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: They inflateable? They look fake.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Tag out, Taddie, I wanna taste some zombie meat!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Please, Grandpa, I can handle this myself.

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: You're a sad pathetic man.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Tag out! I'll rip his face off!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Grandpa, please! I can manage this situation in a civil and orderly...

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Talk, talk, talk, is that all you're good for?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, well I...

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Gabbity gab, just like your mother.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, let's leave Mom...

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: What kind of superhero are you? Isn't there a planet out there that needs your help or somethin'?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure, but...

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: You got three seconds to get outta here before I break out the atomic elbow, brotha!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares at him)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: One! ...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs, then flies off)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Okay, Zombie, looks like Grandpa's taken over. (Monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: I'll knock that little freak silly.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Time to step into the squared circle, son.

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: I'm here, make your move.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Welcome to Leonard Ghostal's Twilight Zone, yeah!

transcript.speaker: Rob Zombie
transcript.dialogue: You're dead, nobody wants you anymore, your time's up.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: No, your time's up! (fires his power bands, they make wimpy popping sounds and a few sparks) Dagnabbit!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You're shooting blanks, Grandpa!

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Shut your pie hole, Blip! Why, twenty years ago I woulda put your head in a half nelson, twisted it around, saying each letter of the alphabet on every turn, and then when I reached the first letter of my true love's name, it would be the lovely Elizabeth, I would yank your head clean off and roll it down the pike like a bowling ball!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (wide-eyed) Okay.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Alright, here we go, what're we doin'?

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (Monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: And that's how I captured the world television title, during "Clash of the Cosmos IV", in front of...(monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You're on, old-timer.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Don't crowd me, Ringo.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's time for the next guest.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Where is she, is she invisible? (Raven is on the monitor, Grandpa is looking towards Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Look at the monitor!

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Whatsit?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Look at the TV, on your right!

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Ooh! Hey there, little girl, what's your name?

transcript.speaker: Raven Symone
transcript.dialogue: Well, I'm Raven Symone, and I'm ten years old. I was on "Hangin' with Mr. Cooper" and "The Cosby Show".

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (shouting) Did you know that you're on the TV?

transcript.speaker: Raven Symone
transcript.dialogue: Yes! Just like you.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (shouting) Have you met any famous people on the TV?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Stop yelling, she can hear you.

transcript.speaker: Raven Symone
transcript.dialogue: I've met Whitney Houston, I've met Michael Jackson, I've met...

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Have you met Haystacks Calhoun? He was a mountain of a man! I sent him home to Mommy with a rollin' DDT! How about Gorgeous George? Chief "Wahoo" McDaniel? Leaping Lanny? Wildfire Tommy Rich? They all fell victim to my credit! Purple, nurple, Jerry Belly, oh yeah! (Zorak sips coffee and Moltar reads a book during this monolog)

transcript.speaker: Raven Symone
transcript.dialogue: (stares back in silence)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: You still with me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, The Mind Taker, it seems that you have me tied up!

transcript.speaker: Mind Taker
transcript.dialogue: (blasts Space Ghost in the face with rays from his eyes)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (grunts and groans) (I don't know, maybe Grandpa was right. I kinda miss this.)

transcript.speaker: Mind Taker
transcript.dialogue: (stops blasting) (giggles)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I will not let you defeat me, vile villain!

transcript.speaker: Mind Taker
transcript.dialogue: (blasts Space Ghost again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (grunts and groans) (Oh, what am I thinking? My heart's not really in this. I don't really belong here. Man, how long can he keep this up?)

transcript.speaker: Raven Symone
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I can, like, do all sorts of stuff, I can bend my pinky back, and I can...

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Don't you raise a hand to me, missy, I'll put you in a figure four leg lock!

transcript.speaker: Raven Symone
transcript.dialogue: I haven't done anything bad yet.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Except for this show! (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, Blip, or I'll slam your head so far down between your shoulder blades, you'll have to open that vest to face your own anguish as I hold a mirror up to your midsection! Yeah!

transcript.speaker: Mind Taker
transcript.dialogue: (continues blasting Space Ghost and giggling)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Yeah, this is gonna get infected.)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: You ever get the thrill of slingin' one of your little school chums against the mat and watchin' their eyes roll back in their head like they're some kind of little freak?

transcript.speaker: Raven Symone
transcript.dialogue: No, not really, I try to be, you know, nice to people.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: You don't know what you're missin', little missy! The back breaker, yeah!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (wrestling announcer style) What's this? Zorak has picked up a folding chair. Seems to be making his way to deskside. I tell ya, you don't want someone comin' at you with one of those things, you can do some serious damage. I wanna take this time to apologize to the television audience for what they're about to see. (as Moltar talks, monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (who has been walking towards the desk with a folding chair) (bashes Grandpa repeatly with the chair)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ohhhh! Let's not forget that Leonard Ghostal is retired. And that act of violence was very extreme!

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (lying on the floor) (groans)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, you had it comin', Ghostal! (hears sound of screeching tires, looks wide-eyed)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh oh!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to set) Grandpa! What happened?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh, he fell down.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Because of an.. accident. That happened.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: That made him.. fall down.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Is, is that you, Thaddeus?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Are you alright?! Talk to me, Grandpa, say something!

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Your pet monkey hit me with a folding chair.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (aims power bands at Zorak, prepares to fire)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hol-hol-hol-hol-hold it... The, uh, the Cosby kid made me do it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Be gone, wicked girl child of television's "Hanging with Mr. Cooper"! (zaps Raven off the monitor)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Good shot! She was askin' for it. It's about time you did somethin' about her. She was trouble.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (gets up and sneaks toward Zorak while he is talking) Aaaah! (jumps in front of Zorak and hits him with the back of his forearm) Taste the pain, brotha! (he holds Zorak upside down)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Mommy! That's my bad knee! Mommy!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What can I do for ya?

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, please.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, there's a saucer crab out here to see ya.

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: I wish to give him the beating of his life.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (slinks down behind his desk) Tell him I'm not here.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: What?!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: He says he's not here.

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: Come outside, sniveling coward. Now is the time for your weekly beating.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Beating?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Shh, Grandpa, be quiet, and maybe he'll go away.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Punk him out, Tadley!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: But he has a death ray!

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Well, if you're not gonna do it, then I will! I'm callin' you out, crab! (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in commanding voice) You go ahead, Grandpa, I'll take care of things here.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: (flying toward saucer crab) I'll show you what you get when you go mano y mano with the Gray Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: What?! Ahh! Ooooh! Usin' a tractor beam on an old man, eh?

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: Silence, old man! (door closes)

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: It's okay, Les, I think we're out of range.

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: Was that too much?

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: No, no, no, you were great! Thanks for the rescue, man!

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: Don't mention it.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Who's, uh, next on the beating list?

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: Earthling Mary Hart.

transcript.speaker: Grandpa Ghostal
transcript.dialogue: Finally, some Entertainment Tonight! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Saucer Crab
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)
